author: Hardik Dhamija
title: Acer Medical aiMed: AI Cuts Healthcare Documentation Time by 75%
text:
Healthcare is drowning in paperwork, but Acer Medical just threw a lifeline. The new aiMed generative AI system tackles one of medicine’s biggest productivity killers – clinical documentation that currently consumes 25% of healthcare providers’ working hours.
This isn’t another healthcare AI gimmick. aiMed represents a fundamental shift in how medical records get created, processed, and managed.
The Healthcare Documentation Crisis The numbers are staggering: healthcare providers spend one-quarter of their workday on medical record keeping instead of patient care. This administrative burden contributes significantly to physician burnout and reduces the quality of patient interactions.
aiMed’s solution is elegantly simple yet technologically sophisticated – real-time voice-to-EMR conversion that understands medical terminology and context.
aiMed Core Features Overview Feature Benefit Impact Voice-to-EMR Converts dictation to structured records Reduces documentation time Medical ASR Specialized healthcare terminology Improves accuracy Cloud Architecture Secure, scalable deployment Enterprise-ready HIS Integration Works with existing systems No workflow disruption Beyond Documentation: VeriSee Vision Screening Acer Medical’s portfolio extends beyond documentation with the VeriSee platform – AI-powered ophthalmology screening that delivers results in seconds. The platform covers three critical areas:
VeriSee DR : Diabetic retinopathy detection VeriSee AMD : Age-related macular degeneration screening VeriSee GLC : Glaucoma suspect identification Currently deployed across 500+ clinics in 14 international markets , VeriSee demonstrates real-world AI healthcare impact at scale.
Real-World Healthcare Transformation aiMed addresses clinical documentation overload through specialized automatic speech recognition that understands medical context. The system maintains interoperability with hospital information systems while ensuring compliance with healthcare documentation standards.
The secure cloud-based architecture provides data protection without sacrificing functionality – crucial for healthcare environments where patient privacy is paramount.
Market Validation and Global Reach VeriSee’s extensive deployment validates Acer Medical’s approach to AI healthcare solutions. The platform’s ability to analyze color retinal images and deliver rapid screening results enables timely interventions for high-risk patients, improving preventive care outcomes.
This combination of generative AI for documentation and computer vision for screening positions Acer Medical as a comprehensive healthcare AI provider rather than a single-solution vendor.
For detailed information about Acer Medical’s healthcare AI solutions, visit www.acer-medical.com .
The healthcare industry’s AI transformation is accelerating, and solutions like aiMed prove that practical, deployment-ready systems are moving beyond pilot programs into widespread clinical use.
FAQs How much time does aiMed save? It targets the 25% of working hours currently spent on medical documentation.
Is VeriSee clinically validated? Yes, it’s deployed in over 500 clinics across 14 international markets.
